content: chart is 48-stitches wide so they all work perfectly for pairing your pronouns need more information head over to how to use design-it- yourself blank doodle mini charts need another blank mini chart download one here chart key knit in darker color knit in lighter color blank version slash version pacific knit co © 2025 | www pacificknitco com | #pkcpronoundoodle page 11 welcome to doodles through whimsical modular colorwork patterns doodles by pacific knit co aims to empower knitters to learn new techniques and get excited about exploring their creativity and creating their own unique design doodle patterns empower creativity within a structure so you eliminate the guesswork while building valuable skills you can use again and again modular base patterns mix-and-match colorwork charts easy pattern modifications when i first started knitting i spent hours learning how to alter a pattern and do the math to create exactly what i wanted now i want to encourage adventurous beginners to take on a new challenge with me every doodle pattern provides you with opportunities for customization in colorwork and construction built right in so you don t have to struggle - just choose exactly the thank you for purchasing my pattern please email right option for you me for pattern support questions or general info each doodle theme is available in 3 formats so you can get the one that works for you www pacificknitco com digital pattern pdf full details and tutorials pacificknitco charts only pdf perfect to add to anything doodle card decks portable and collectable cards @pacificknitco be sure to tag me @pacificknitco in your posts support@pacificknitco com you may also enjoy pattern usage and rights this pattern and all charts located within are the exclusive copywrite of pacific knit co and are intended for personal use only charts may not be used and/or resold in personal designs or patterns finished items made from this pattern may be sold in small quantities thank you for tagging me and my pattern when sharing on social media pattern credits design & photos jamie lomax pacific knit co yarn support mckenzie mullen em to the third additional support isa pagel four finger fibers standard doodle cowl doodle beanie 2 pacific knit co © 2025 | www pacificknitco com | #pkcpronoundoodle page 12
